channel.title: CVE Feed for NetApp -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NetApp -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-27315|2024-09-18T16:33:01.296Z -- netapp -- snapgathers
item.description: SnapGathers versions prior to 4.9 are susceptible to a vulnerability which could allow a local authenticated attacker to discover plaintext domain user credentials

item.title: CVE-2023-27314|2024-09-18T15:02:57.897Z -- netapp -- ontap%209
item.description: ONTAP 9 versions prior to 9.8P19, 9.9.1P16, 9.10.1P12, 9.11.1P8, 9.12.1P2 and 9.13.1 are susceptible to a vulnerability which could allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to cause a crash of the HTTP service.

item.title: CVE-2023-27316|2024-09-18T14:59:18.438Z -- netapp -- snapcenter
item.description: SnapCenter versions 4.8 through 4.9 are susceptible to a vulnerability which may allow an authenticated SnapCenter Server user to become an admin user on a remote system where a SnapCenter plug-in has been installed.

item.title: CVE-2024-21989|2024-08-01T22:35:34.729Z -- netapp -- ontap%20select%20deploy%20administration%20utility
item.description: ONTAP Select Deploy administration utility versions 9.12.1.x, 9.13.1.x and 9.14.1.x are susceptible to a vulnerability which when successfully exploited could allow a read-only user to escalate their privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-21993|2024-08-01T22:35:34.687Z -- netapp -- snapcenter
item.description: SnapCenter versions prior to 5.0p1 are susceptible to a vulnerability which could allow an authenticated attacker to discover plaintext credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-21988|2024-08-01T22:35:34.576Z -- netapp -- storagegrid%20%28formerly%20storagegrid%20webscale%29
item.description: StorageGRID (formerly StorageGRID Webscale) versions prior to 11.7.0.9 and 11.8.0.5 are susceptible to disclosure of sensitive information via complex MiTM attacks due to a vulnerability in the SSH cryptographic implementation.

item.title: CVE-2024-21990|2024-08-01T22:35:34.847Z -- netapp -- ontap%20select%20deploy%20administration%20utility
item.description: ONTAP Select Deploy administration utility versions 9.12.1.x, 9.13.1.x and 9.14.1.x contain hard-coded credentials that could allow an attacker to view Deploy configuration information and modify the account credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-21989|2024-07-23T18:50:11.927Z -- netapp -- ontap%20select%20deploy%20administration%20utility
item.description: ONTAP Select Deploy administration utility versions 9.12.1.x, 9.13.1.x and 9.14.1.x are susceptible to a vulnerability which when successfully exploited could allow a read-only user to escalate their privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-21993|2024-07-09T21:26:03.404Z -- netapp -- snapcenter
item.description: SnapCenter versions prior to 5.0p1 are susceptible to a vulnerability which could allow an authenticated attacker to discover plaintext credentials.

item.description: StorageGRID (formerly StorageGRID Webscale) versions prior to 11.7.0.9 and 11.8.0.5 are susceptible to disclosure of sensitive information via complex MiTM attacks due to a vulnerability in the SSH cryptographic implementation.

item.description: ONTAP Select Deploy administration utility versions 9.12.1.x, 9.13.1.x and 9.14.1.x contain hard-coded credentials that could allow an attacker to view Deploy configuration information and modify the account credentials.
